rukus.text: By those who tear it out with violence
By those who gently draw it out
And by those who glide along
Then press forward as in a race
And plan to do it
One day all that can be in commotion will be in violent commotion
Followed by repeated commotions
Hearts that day will be in agitation
Their eyes will be caste down
They say, “What, will we indeed be returned to our former state
“What, when we will have become decayed bones?”
They say, “It would, in that case, be a return with loss.”
But indeed, it will be but a single cry
When behold, they will be in the awakening
Has the story of Moses reached you
Behold, your Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa
“Go to Pharaoh, for he has indeed transgressed all bounds
“And say to him, ‘Do you want to be purified
“And that I guide you to your Lord, so you can fear Him?”
Then Moses showed him the great sign
But he rejected it and did not follow
Further, he turned his back, striving hard
Then he gathered them and made a proclamation
Saying, “I am your Lord, Most High”
But God punished him, and made an example of him, in the hereafter, and in the present life
Indeed in this is an instructive warning for whoever is conscious of God
